attributes.action: become a football manager at the Rockhouse FC in Eccles Gtr  Manchester, to help the team out, because the manager is about to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our football team needs a new manager , Mr Blair would fit this position very well , also it would give him something to do when Gordon Brown takes over running the country

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
